summary: Language Selection Produces Missing or Incorrect Translations
description: Selecting alternate languages in the Settings menu results in missing text, partially translated text, wrong translation context or literal placeholders such as “NO TRANSLATI ON FOUND FOR UI BUTTONS.” Language options appear incomplete or improperly mapped.
steps: 4. Observe text inconsistencies or missing translations.
expected: All UI text should display correctly in the selected language.
actual: Missing translation strings and placeholder text appear across the UI.
